name: FLASHLIFE
description:
FLASHLIFE is an arcade bullet hell game where you can only see using your torch.

"What? Why is it so dark?"

Swoosh, a fireball skims past your face.

The power button on your torch makes a satisfying CLICK and it stutters to life.

"Wait, it's out of power already?"

You unscrew the cap of the torch and see it takes... 5 AAA batteries! 

Dodge fireballs and laser beams.

Collect batteries to power your torch.

Rack up a massive score.
